sentences.en: He has never regarded you as a friend, only a henchman.
sentences.cn: 他根本没把你当朋友, 只不过把你当成了他的腿子.

sentences.en: Henchman who swagger around and watch posture, non - ends today Caolu, who Narcissus not tea.
sentences.cn: 狗腿子们耀武扬威,看那架势, 今天 非 踏平草庐, 抢走水仙茶不可.

sentences.en: Millions were caught up in the movement and did the Great Henchman's bidding.
sentences.cn: 上百万的人们陷入了运动中,众多的跟随者也纷纷如此.

sentences.en: The gang chief went everywhere accompanied by his henchman.
sentences.cn: 那流氓头子到什么地方都有手下的狗腿子跟着.

words.tran_cn: 亲信；追随者；（美）走狗；侍从
